about.title: About Medicare
about.mission: Medicare is a leading medical supplies wholesaler in Uzbekistan, dedicated to providing healthcare facilities with high-quality, certified medical equipment and disposables.
about.qualityDesc: All our products meet CE and ISO certification standards, ensuring safety and reliability.
about.logisticsDesc: Modern warehouse facilities and efficient delivery network across Uzbekistan.
about.certificationDesc: CE certified and ISO compliant products with full documentation.

timeline.founded: Company founded with a vision for quality healthcare distribution

about.teamDesc: Over 150 dedicated professionals ensuring your medical supplies arrive on time, every time.
about.ctaDesc: Get in touch today and discover how we can support your healthcare needs.
about.ceoDesc: Visionary leader with over 15 years of experience shaping the future of our company.
about.ctoDesc: Tech mastermind leading cutting-edge development and innovation in our products.
about.cmoDesc: Creative strategist scaling our brand globally with bold marketing vision.

contacts.text: Our team is always ready to help. Contact our specialists in the way that’s most convenient for you — we’ll suggest the best solutions for your clinic.
contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

faq.a1: Standard delivery: 1–3 business days. Express: same-day in Tashkent.
faq.a2: Yes, we ship to CIS countries and select international destinations.
faq.q3: How can I track my order?
faq.a3: You’ll receive a tracking link via SMS and email after dispatch.
faq.a4: 30-day returns on unopened products. Contact support to initiate.

footer.description: Professional medical supplies wholesaler in Uzbekistan

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Medicare collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you request a price list or contact us.
privacy.usageText: We use the information to respond to your inquiries, provide services, and improve our offerings.
privacy.protectionText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Medicare's services, you agree to these terms.
terms.servicesText: Medicare provides wholesale medical supplies to healthcare facilities and institutions.
terms.ordersText: All orders are subject to availability and confirmation. Delivery times are estimates.
terms.liabilityText: Medicare strives to provide accurate product information but does not guarantee absolute accuracy.

1.name: Unigloves
1.description: Non-sterile, nitrile, non-powdered, textured, ambidextrous, single-use examination gloves.

6.name: Sterilization kraft roll
6.description: Sterilization kraft roll is a high-quality packaging material designed to protect medical instruments during and after the sterilization process.Made from dense medical-grade cellulose, it provides a reliable microbial barrier and is compatible with steam, hot air, and EO gas sterilization. Its long roll format makes it ideal for high-volume use in clinics, dental centers, and sterilization departments.

7.name: Sterile surgical drape
7.description: Sterile surgical drape 200×160 cm,designed to provide a protected and sterile surgical field. The higher-density nonwoven fabric offers enhanced fluid resistance and reliable contamination control throughout medical procedures.

8.name: Dentafill Surgical Gloves
8.description: Single-use sterile surgical gloves made from rubber latex

9.name: Sterile surgical gown
9.description: Sterile surgical gown is designed to protect medical staff during surgeries and procedures. The lightweight, breathable nonwoven material provides comfort while maintaining an effective barrier against biological contaminants.

10.name: UKM sterile surgical gown
10.description: UKM sterile surgical gown, density 35 g/m² is designed to provide a protective barrier during surgeries and medical procedures. The lightweight yet durable material ensures comfort during long use and protects against biological contamination.

11.name: Sterile dental kit for single use "NEST-DENT"
11.description: "NEST-DENT" sterile single-use dental kit is designed for diagnostic and therapeutic dental procedures. The kit ensures full hygiene, minimizes infection risks, and eliminates the need for instrument reuse.

13.name: Uniset IV system
13.description: Disposable IV infusion set with needle

14.name: IV system
14.description: Disposable IV infusion set with needle

20.name: MicroPette Plus Adjustable Pipette, 20–200 µl
20.description: MicroPette Plus Adjustable Pipette, 20–200 µl.A precise and ergonomic micropipette designed for accurate liquid handling in molecular biology, PCR, biochemistry, and routine lab applications. The adjustable range makes it a versatile tool for various sample volumes and daily workflow needs.

24.name: Ultrasonic cleaner
24.description: Ultrasonic cleaner a compact device designed for deep and gentle cleaning of medical instruments, dental tools, laboratory equipment, and small components. It works using ultrasonic cavitation, removing contaminants from even the hardest-to-reach areas.

25.name: KRAFT PACKAGING ROLL “STANDART” for Plasma Sterilization
25.description: KRAFT PACKAGING ROLL “STANDART” for Plasma Sterilization.A high-quality kraft sterilization roll designed specifically for plasma sterilization systems. It ensures secure wrapping of medical instruments, maintains sterility after processing, and provides reliable protection during storage and transportation. The material is breathable for sterilization gases while effectively blocking dust and microorganisms.

26.name: PK02-45 sealing machine
26.description: PK02-45 sealing machine is a durable, high-capacity device designed for sealing sterilization rolls and pouches. Its expanded working width and reinforced construction allow processing larger and longer packaging materials. The machine produces a strong, uniform thermal seal that keeps sterilization packaging hermetically closed.

27.name: PK100-A sealing machine
27.description: PK100-A sealing machine is a compact professional device designed for hermetically sealing sterilization rolls and pouches. It produces a strong, uniform thermal seal that keeps instruments protected from moisture and air prior to sterilization.

28.name: The PK212 Double-Layer Kraft Bag Stand
28.description: The PK212 Double-Layer Kraft Bag Stand is a practical and space-efficient solution designed for retail counters, pharmacies, cafés, and packing stations.Its two-tier structure allows bags to be grouped by size, ensuring quick access and smoother workflow during busy hours. Built with a sturdy metal frame, the stand maintains stability and durability even under constant daily use.

29.name: PKD300AB packaging machine
29.description: PKD300AB packaging machine is a dependable sealing device designed for hermetically closing sterilization rolls and pouches. It delivers consistent temperature control and even heating across the sealing line, ensuring high-quality seals suitable for daily clinical use.

31.name: Alcohol Wipes No.100
31.description: Alcohol Wipes — No.100 are ready-to-use disposable antiseptic wipes saturated with a highly effective alcohol solution. Designed for skin disinfection prior to injections, procedures, and minor treatments. They evaporate quickly, leave no residue, and offer reliable hygienic protection

33.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Needles
33.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Needles — Pack of 100 (22G / 23G).hese needles are designed for use with vacuum blood collection tubes, ensuring smooth and controlled venipuncture. Available in 22G and 23G sizes, they offer optimal comfort for patients and reliable performance for healthcare professionals. Sterile and latex-free

37.name: Sterile Surgical Kit
37.description: Sterile surgical kit (gown , mask, cap, shoe covers) is designed to create a protective barrier during surgical procedures. The kit ensures full sterility, reduces infection risks, and provides comfort for medical personnel.

39.name: Kraft Sterilization Roll “PREMIUM” for Plasma Sterilization
39.description: Kraft Sterilization Roll “PREMIUM” for Plasma Sterilization. A premium universal-width sterilization roll suitable for medium-sized medical tools and trays. Provides enhanced durability, excellent microbial barrier performance, and stability during plasma sterilization

43.name: KD-FLY Winged Infusion Set
43.description: Winged infusion set - Scalp vein set

44.name: Plastic disposal container
44.description: Plastic disposal container is designed for the safe collection, storage, and disposal of medical waste such as needles, syringes, sharp tools, and contaminated materials. Made from durable plastic, it prevents leaks and accidental contact with hazardous items.

45.name: Barrier film
45.description: Barrier film is a high-protection, multi-layer packaging material used to maintain the sterility of medical instruments and supplies. It forms a reliable shield against microorganisms, moisture, dust, and external contamination. Ideal for dental clinics, surgical departments, laboratories, and sterilization units, it ensures the safe storage and transportation of sterilized tools.

46.name: Dental Cotton Rolls
46.description: Cotton Rolls 10×38 mm, 1000 pcs/bag are designed for moisture absorption and isolation of the working area in dentistry. They provide excellent absorbency, maintain their shape, and offer patient comfort during procedures

47.name: LDH-Cannula
47.description: Japanese stainless steel LDH-Cannula for single use

48.name: Salvia Ejectors
48.description: SE-01 Saliva Ejectors, 100 pcs/bag are disposable dental suction tubes designed to efficiently remove saliva and fluids during procedures. Their flexible body allows easy shaping, while the soft tip ensures patient comfort.

50.name: Sterile nasal/nasopharyngeal swab probe, individually packaged
50.description: Sterile nasal/nasopharyngeal swab, individually packed is designed for safe and precise sample collection. Its soft tip reduces discomfort, while individual sterile packaging ensures complete hygiene and eliminates cross-contamination risks.

51.name: Latex Tourniquet
51.description: A durable and flexible medical tourniquet designed for venipuncture, injections, and routine blood collection procedures. Made from natural latex, it provides excellent elasticity, smooth tension distribution, and secure placement without causing discomfort. Easy to apply and remove, making it ideal for high-use clinical environments.

55.name: ECG Recording Paper
55.description: ECG Recording Paper — high-quality thermal chart paper designed for use in electrocardiograph devices. Provides clear waveform printing, stable thermal response, and accurate transmission of diagnostic cardiac data.

56.name: Medik Plast winged IV cannula
56.description: Winged IV cannula with injection port

57.name: Medik Plast non-sterile elastic medical adhesive plaster
57.description: Non-sterile elastic medical adhesive plaster, 15cm x 10m

58.name: Yellow Pipette Tips
58.description: Yellow Pipette Tips.Premium-quality disposable pipette tips for precise dispensing of small to medium liquid volumes. Compatible with most universal and Eppendorf-style pipettes. Made of robust polypropylene for smooth liquid uptake and minimal sample retention.

61.name: Dental Bib Napkins
61.description: Dental Bib Napkins — size 45×33 cm provide reliable protection for patients' clothing during dental, cosmetic, and clinical procedures. Their multilayer structure offers excellent moisture resistance while maintaining comfort and hygiene. A range of colors adds a professional and pleasant appearance to the treatment room.

62.name: Blood Pressure Monitor IAD-01 “Adyutor”
62.description: The IAD-01 “Adyutor” is a dependable automatic device for measuring blood pressure and pulse rate. Designed for both clinical and home use, it provides high accuracy, stable readings, and intuitive operation. Its large, clear display makes results easy to read, while the smart inflation technology ensures a comfortable measurement experience.

66.name: Cover Glass
66.description: Cover Glass, Pack of 1000.Larger-format cover glass designed for preparing microscope slides that require a wider viewing area. Made from premium optical glass, it ensures crystal-clear imaging with no distortion and excellent adhesion to specimen slides. Ideal for cytology, histology, and general microscopy.

68.name: Unitest-steam 132/20, internal steam indicator
68.description: Internal indicator for steam sterilization 132°C / 20 min (1000 pcs) — Unitest Steam is designed to monitor the effectiveness of the sterilization cycle inside the package. The indicator changes color once the required temperature and exposure time are reached, ensuring accurate verification of autoclave performance.

69.name: Unitest-steam 132/20, external steam indicator
69.description: External indicator for steam sterilization 132°C / 20 min (1000 pcs) — Unitest Steam is used for external monitoring of sterilization cycles. Applied to the outside of sterilization packs, the indicator changes color when exposed to the required temperature and exposure time, confirming that the package has passed through the autoclave.

70.name: Unitest-steam 134/5, universal steam indicator
70.description: Universal indicator for steam sterilization 134°C / 5 min (1000 pcs) — UNITEST STEAM is designed to verify that sterilization cycles meet the required temperature and exposure time. The indicator provides a clear color change once the correct conditions are achieved, confirming effective autoclave processing.

71.name: Sterilan internal indicator strips 132/20
71.description: “Sterilan”-UP internal indicators for steam sterilization 132°C / 20 min (1000 pcs) are designed to verify sterilization effectiveness inside the package or instrument set. The indicator is placed in the most challenging area to ensure accurate confirmation that required temperature and exposure time conditions were achieved.

72.name: Sterilan external indicator strips 132/20
72.description: “Sterilan” external indicators for steam sterilization 132°C / 20 min (1000 pcs) are used for marking the outside of sterilization packages. When exposed to the required steam and temperature conditions, the indicator changes color, confirming that the item has completed an autoclave cycle.

73.name: Sterilan internal indicator strips 180/60
73.description: “Sterilan”-UP internal indicators for dry heat sterilization 180°C / 60 min (1000 pcs) are used to verify sterilization quality inside the package. Placed deep within the load, the indicator changes color only when the required temperature and exposure time are fully achieved, ensuring accurate confirmation of dry-heat sterilization effectiveness.

74.name: Sterilan external indicator strips 180/60
74.description: “Sterilan” external indicators for dry heat sterilization 180°C / 60 min (1000 pcs) are designed for labeling sterilization packs prior to processing. The indicator changes color after exposure to the required temperature and time, confirming that the package has undergone a full dry heat sterilization cycle.

75.name: “STERITEST-P-132/20-02” sterilization indicators
75.description: “STERITEST-P-132/20-02” sterilization indicators (1000 pcs) with logbook are designed for internal monitoring of steam sterilization processes. Each indicator reacts only when the required exposure of 132°C for 20 minutes is achieved, confirming proper heat penetration. The included logbook allows accurate tracking and documentation of every sterilization cycle.

76.name: MedIS-132/20-1 sterilization indicator
76.description: MedIS-132/20-1 sterilization indicator (1000 pcs) is designed for internal monitoring of steam sterilization parameters. The indicator changes color once the required conditions of 132°C for 20 minutes are met, confirming effective sterilization inside the package.

77.name: MedIS-B sterilization indicator for dry-heat sterilization 180/60
77.description: MedIS-B sterilization indicator for dry-heat sterilization 180°C / 60 min (1000 pcs) is designed to verify the accuracy of the dry-heat sterilization cycle. The indicator shifts color once the required temperature and exposure time are achieved, confirming proper processing of items inside the pack or container.

80.name: Medical Mercury Thermometer
80.description: A traditional medical mercury thermometer designed for highly accurate body temperature measurement. Known for its excellent precision and reliability, it is suitable for both home use and clinical applications. The heat-resistant glass body and clear scale ensure easy and consistent readings.

81.name: Surgeon Disposable Scalpels
81.description: Premium disposable scalpels with blade guard

82.name: Nasal irrigation olive tip
82.description: Nasal irrigation olive tip is a soft medical attachment designed for safe and comfortable delivery of solution into the nasal passages. It provides a controlled fluid flow, prevents mucosal injury, and is suitable for both adults and children during treatment or preventive care.

83.name: Tonsil irrigation cannula
83.description: Tonsil irrigation cannula is a thin medical tip designed for precise delivery of solution into the tonsil crypts. It provides a directed fluid flow, helps remove debris and plugs, and reduces inflammation in the treatment of chronic tonsillitis.

84.name: EP-150-E-J Microcentrifuge Tube
84.description: EP-150-E-J Microcentrifuge Tube — 1.5 ml, Eppendorf Type, DNA/RNA-Free, Pack of 500.These tubes are designed for molecular biology, biochemistry, PCR, and nucleic acid–related workflows. Being DNA/RNA-free, they eliminate contamination risks, ensuring reliable and reproducible results. Manufactured from high-quality polypropylene, they are compatible with high-speed microcentrifugation and maintain structural integrity under stress.

86.name: Spinal Anesthesia Needles
86.description: Spinal Anesthesia Needles — Quincke Type, 25G and 26G.Quincke spinal needles are designed for precise dural puncture with minimal tissue trauma. Their cutting-bevel tip provides accurate entry into the subarachnoid space. Widely used in anesthesiology, neurosurgery, and pain-management procedures.

92.name: Needle Holder with Safety Cover
92.description: Needle Holder with Safety Cover.This holder is designed for secure attachment and stabilization of needles during vacuum blood collection. The integrated safety cover helps protect healthcare workers from accidental needle-stick injuries and ensures safe disposal. It provides strong grip and seamless compatibility with standard vacuum needles and tubes

93.name: Ultrasound Gel “Akugel”, 5 kg canister
93.description: Ultrasound Gel “Akugel”, 5 kg canister — a professional contact gel designed for high-quality ultrasound diagnostics. It ensures excellent acoustic transmission, enhances visualization of tissues, and provides stable, clear imaging. The large 5 kg container is ideal for clinics and high-volume diagnostic centers.

97.name: Disposable plastic ENT spatula
97.description: Disposable plastic ENT spatula is designed for examination of the oral cavity, tongue, and tonsils. It provides hygienic and comfortable diagnostic use. The smooth, rounded surface prevents mucosal injury, and the single-use format eliminates cross-contamination risks.

99.name: Disposable ear funnels
99.description: Disposable ear funnels are designed for safe ear examination and hygienic procedures. Made from lightweight, hygienic material, they provide single-use protection and help prevent cross-contamination.

100.name: Sterile specimen collection swab
100.description: Sterile specimen collection swab in a transport tube

101.name: Electrosurgical cautery pencil
101.description: The electrosurgical pencil is a precision tool used for cutting and coagulating soft tissues during surgical procedures. It connects to electrocautery generators and delivers controlled energy to the operative field. Its ergonomic design provides excellent handling, while onboard buttons allow seamless switching between cutting and coagulation modes.

102.name: Azopyram S-GTM
102.description: Azopiram-S GTM, 100 ml is a reagent used to verify the quality of pre-sterilization cleaning of medical instruments. It detects traces of blood, proteins, and detergent residues, providing a fast and reliable color reaction.

105.name: Antiseptin 0.5 liter (grade A) for surfaces
105.description: Antiseptin, 0.5 liter (grade A) is a ready-to-use solution for fast and effective surface disinfection. It provides a broad antimicrobial effect and is suitable for use in medical facilities, workplaces, and home environments. Dries quickly and leaves no residue.

106.name: ABK Extra 1 liter for processing instruments before sterilization
106.description: ABK Extra, 1 liter is a professional solution used for pre-cleaning and disinfecting medical instruments before sterilization. It offers strong antimicrobial action, efficiently removes organic contaminants, and ensures proper preparation of instruments for further sterilization.

107.name: Antiseptin OP 0.5l (brand B) with trigger
107.description: Antiseptin OP, 0.5 L (grade B) with trigger sprayer is a skin antiseptic designed for fast and safe hand and skin disinfection. The trigger dispenser allows even application and economical use. Provides strong antimicrobial action, does not dry the skin, and is suitable for frequent use.

108.name: Septodes 1 liter for processing instruments before sterilization
108.description: Septodez, 1 liter is a disinfecting solution used for pre-treatment of medical instruments before sterilization. It provides a broad antimicrobial effect, removes organic contamination, and ensures safety for further sterilization processes.

109.name: DS-1 0.5l (concentrate)
109.description: DS-1, 0.5 L (concentrate) is a universal disinfectant concentrate used for preparing working solutions. It provides a broad antimicrobial spectrum and is suitable for disinfecting surfaces, equipment, and sanitary areas in medical, household, and industrial environments.

110.name: Plasma sterilization indicators
110.description: Plasma sterilization indicators are chemical test strips designed to visually confirm whether the low-temperature plasma sterilization cycle has been completed correctly.When exposed to the proper sterilization conditions, the indicator changes color, ensuring reliable verification of the process.

111.name: Phenolphthalein 100ml
111.description: Phenolphthalein, 100 ml is an indicator solution widely used in analytical and laboratory work. It provides a clear visual color change when the environment shifts from acidic to alkaline, making it suitable for titration and pH monitoring.

112.name: Microscope Slide, Non-Ground Edges
112.description: Microscope Slide, Non-Ground Edges, Pack of 50.High-quality glass microscope slides designed for routine sample preparation. Made from clear optical glass to ensure sharp, distortion-free imaging. Non-ground edges provide a standard economical option suitable for everyday laboratory applications.

113.name: Disposable nonwoven caps “Clinic Clean”
113.description: Disposable nonwoven caps “Clinic Clean” (white, green) are designed to maintain hygiene and prevent hair from entering clean or sterile environments. Lightweight, breathable, and comfortable, they are suitable for medical facilities, laboratories, food production, and beauty services.

114.name: Disposable Sheets
114.description: Disposable Sheets — 20 g/m² provide a hygienic, lightweight protective layer suitable for daily professional use. The convenient 10-sheet pack format is ideal for mobile specialists, small clinics, beauty rooms, and quick replacements. Multiple color options help match the setting or service style.

115.name: Disposable nonwoven caps
115.description: Disposable nonwoven caps (white, pink) are designed to maintain hygiene and prevent hair from entering clean or controlled environments. Lightweight and breathable, they ensure comfortable use in medical centers, laboratories, food production, and beauty services.

116.name: Disposable Procedure Shorts (Spunbond)
116.description: Disposable Procedure Shorts (Spunbond) offer comfort and hygienic protection during cosmetic, SPA, massage, and medical treatments. Made from lightweight, breathable spunbond fabric, they ensure ease of movement and pleasant wear for clients.

117.name: Container for biomaterials
117.description: Plastic Sample Collection Container.A compact and secure container designed for collecting, storing, and transporting various biological samples such as urine, sputum, and small clinical specimens. Made from medical-grade polypropylene, it ensures durability and sample integrity. The leak-proof lid protects against spills and contamination.

118.name: Baxtteks-farm gauze
118.description: Medical cotton gauze, bleached in pieces

124.name: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads
124.description: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads (2-ply, 45×29, No.5) are designed for wound cleaning, dressing application, and absorbing exudates. Their large size makes them suitable for treating wider wound areas and ensuring comfortable coverage.

125.name: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads “SARBONTEKS”
125.description: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads “SARBONTEKS” are designed for wound cleaning, exudate absorption, and applying large dressings. Their extended size ensures comfortable coverage of wider wound areas with soft, skin-friendly contact.

130.name: Medical Bleached Cotton Gauze “SARBONTEKS”
130.description: Medical Bleached Cotton Gauze “SARBONTEKS” is a reliable, soft dressing material made from natural cotton. It provides excellent absorbency, breathability, and gentle contact with the skin.

132.name: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads
132.description: Sterile Medical Gauze Pads (2-ply, 16×14, No.10) are designed for wound cleaning, bleeding control, and hygienic dressing applications. Their soft, sterile structure ensures safe and gentle contact with the skin.

135.name: Disposable polyethylene caps
135.description: Disposable polyethylene caps (white, new model) provide hygienic protection by preventing hair from entering clean or controlled environments. Lightweight, moisture-resistant, and comfortable, they are suitable for medical facilities, food production, laboratories, and beauty services.

136.name: Disposable polyethylene shoe covers
136.description: Disposable polyethylene shoe covers are designed to protect indoor environments from dirt and moisture. Lightweight, waterproof, and easy to use, they are suitable for medical facilities, laboratories, beauty salons, and everyday hygiene.

138.name: Self-sealing sterilization pouch
138.description: Self-sealing sterilization pouch is designed for safe packaging of small medical instruments such as dental tips, needles, and fine tools.Its built-in adhesive strip allows fast and secure sealing—no sealing machine required. The combination of medical-grade kraft paper and transparent film ensures full visibility and strong microbial protection.

142.name: Finflex Disposable surgical gloves
142.description: Disposable surgical gloves made of rubber latex, sterile

147.name: Polyglycolic Acid (PGA) Surgical Suture
147.description: Polyglycolic Acid (PGA) Surgical Suture — a high-strength, absorbable, synthetic braided suture designed for reliable wound closure across various surgical fields. It ensures excellent knot security, smooth tissue passage, and predictable absorption during postoperative healing.

149.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with Clot Activator
149.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with Clot Activator — Red Cap.Designed for high-volume serum collection in biochemistry, immunology, and serology testing. The interior contains a clot activator that accelerates coagulation, ensuring clean and reliable serum separation.

150.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with Lithium Heparin
150.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with Lithium Heparin — 13×75 mm, 5 ml, Green Cap.Designed for plasma-based laboratory testing. Lithium heparin acts as an anticoagulant, preventing clotting and ensuring rapid sample processing. The green cap follows international coding for biochemistry and electrolyte studies.

151.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with Clot Activator and Gel
151.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with Clot Activator and Gel — Yellow Cap, 13×100 mm, 5 ml.These tubes are designed to obtain high-quality serum. The separating gel forms a stable barrier between the clot and serum after centrifugation, ensuring clean samples for biochemistry, immunology, hormone testing, and other advanced diagnostics. The clot activator accelerates coagulation for faster sample processing.

152.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with EDTA K3
152.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with EDTA K3 — 13×75 mm, 3 ml, Purple Cap.Designed for hematology tests such as CBC and cell counts. EDTA K3 prevents clotting and preserves cell structure for stable, accurate results. The purple cap follows international identification standards.

153.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with 3.2% Sodium Citrate
153.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tubes with 3.2% Sodium Citrate — Blue Cap, 13×75 mm, 2.7 ml.Designed for coagulation testing, including PT, INR, APTT, fibrinogen, D-dimer, and full hemostasis panels. The tube contains a precise amount of 3.2% sodium citrate, which prevents clotting by binding calcium ions. The blue cap follows international coding standards.

154.name: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with Sodium Heparin + Gel
154.description: Vacuum Blood Collection Tube with Sodium Heparin + Gel — 16×100 mm, 8.5 ml, Green Cap (100 pcs).Designed for plasma separation in wide-range biochemical and electrolyte analyses. The sodium heparin anticoagulant prevents clotting, while the separating gel forms a stable barrier after centrifugation, ensuring clean plasma for accurate testing. The larger volume is ideal for multiple tests from a single sample.

155.name: Catgut Suture — a natural absorbable suture
155.description: Catgut Suture — a natural absorbable suture made from purified collagen. It offers good elasticity, smooth passage through tissues, and easy handling, making it suitable for soft-tissue approximation with low tension. The material gradually absorbs within the body and does not require removal.

156.name: Blue Pipette Tips, 1000 µl
156.description: Blue Pipette Tips, 1000 µl, Eppendorf/Universal Type, Polypropylene, 500 pcs/pack.Premium-quality disposable pipette tips designed for accurate handling of large liquid volumes. Compatible with most Eppendorf and universal-style pipettes. Made from pure polypropylene to ensure smooth liquid uptake and consistent dispensing without dripping.

157.name: Indicator Logbook
157.description: Indicator Logbook is a specialized record used to document the results of sterilization and disinfection monitoring. It includes entries for chemical and biological indicators, cycle dates, batch numbers, responsible personnel, and the final assessment of processing quality. The logbook ensures transparency, traceability, and compliance with hygiene standards.

158.name: “Intest-P-134/5-02” sterilization indicators
158.description: “Intest-P-134/5-02” sterilization indicators (500 pcs) are internal monitoring tools designed for steam sterilization cycles. They verify whether the required exposure of 134°C for 5 minutes has been achieved inside the pack by producing a clear color change once the correct conditions are met.

159.name: Disposable surgical gown made of nonwoven material
159.description: Disposable surgical gown made of nonwoven material, density 37 g/m² is designed to protect medical staff during surgeries and procedures. The lightweight, durable, and breathable fabric provides comfort and reduces the risk of contamination.

160.name: UKM sterile surgical kit
160.description: UKM sterile surgical kit (gown 35 g/m², mask, bouffant cap, shoe covers) provides a protective barrier during surgical and medical procedures. The kit ensures hygiene, reduces infection risk, and offers comfort for medical staff.

161.name: UKM sterile surgical drape
161.description: UKM sterile surgical drape is designed to establish a protected and sterile surgical field. The dense nonwoven fabric provides reliable resistance to fluids and contamination while maintaining user comfort.

162.name: Butterfly Blood Collection Needle for Vacuum Tubes
162.description: Butterfly Blood Collection Needle for Vacuum Tubes (22G / 23G, 3/4") This butterfly-style needle ensures comfortable and controlled venous access, especially for small or sensitive veins. Soft flexible wings provide a stable grip, improving precision during blood collection. Fully compatible with vacuum collection systems.

163.name: 1.5 ml Microtubes with EDTA K3 Coating for Hematology Analyzers
163.description: 1.5 ml Microtubes with EDTA K3 Coating for Hematology Analyzers (Pack of 500).These tubes are specifically designed for automated hematology systems. The inner wall is coated with EDTA K3, which effectively prevents clotting and preserves the natural morphology of blood cells. This ensures accurate and reproducible results in CBC and related hematology tests.Manufactured from high-quality polypropylene, the tubes withstand centrifugation and routine handling while maintaining sample integrity.

164.name: Ekstradin, 1 L
164.description: Ekstradin, 1 L (new concentrate) is an advanced high-performance disinfectant designed for preparing working solutions of various strengths. The upgraded formula delivers enhanced antimicrobial action, making it suitable for disinfecting surfaces, instruments, and sanitary areas.

165.description: Disposable Sheets — 20 g/m² are lightweight yet durable protective coverings designed for hygienic single-use applications. The roll of 100 sheets is practical for medical rooms, beauty salons, massage studios, and any setting where clean surface protection is essential. A variety of colors allows easy matching to any professional environment.

166.name: Disposable Wipes
166.description: Disposable Wipes — 15 g/m² (200 sheets per roll) are lightweight, hygienic, and versatile, suitable for use in clinics, beauty salons, massage rooms, and daily sanitation tasks. Available in multiple colors to match different professional environments.

167.name: Disposable Towels in Roll
167.description: Disposable Towels in Roll — 35×70 (100 pcs) provide a hygienic and comfortable solution for clinics, beauty salons, massage rooms, and spa environments. Soft texture ensures client comfort, while the single-use format maintains cleanliness and prevents contamination.

168.name: Disposable Nonwoven Caps
168.description: Disposable nonwoven caps (blue) are designed to maintain hygiene and prevent hair from entering clean or controlled areas. Lightweight and breathable, they ensure comfortable use in medical facilities, laboratories, food industries, and beauty environments.

169.name: Disposable Nonwoven Caps
169.description: Disposable nonwoven caps (black, white) are designed to maintain hygiene and prevent hair from entering clean or controlled environments. Lightweight and breathable, they provide comfort during long use in medical, laboratory, beauty, and food industry settings.

forgot_password.success_message: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.

reset_password.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
reset_password.invalid_link_message: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
reset_password.success_message: Your password has been reset successfully. Redirecting to your account...
